issue.title: [R] Create an arrow-specific checklist for a CRAN release
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-14588](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14588). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
This would adapt and implement the functionality of `usethis::use_release_issue()` for `arrow`'s specific context.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14588?focusedCommentId=17438751) by Jonathan Keane (jonkeane):*
And for context, we also have https://cwiki.apache.org/confluence/display/ARROW/Release+Management+Guide#ReleaseManagementGuide-UpdatingRpackages which includes broader project-related release tasks there's no reason we can't have both / have overlap across them, but we should make sure they are in sync/refer to each other

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14588?focusedCommentId=17610652) by @toddfarmer:*
This issue was last updated over 90 days ago, which may be an indication it is no longer being actively worked. To better reflect the current state, the issue is being unassigned per [project policy](https://arrow.apache.org/docs/dev/developers/bug_reports.html#issue-assignment). Please feel free to re-take assignment of the issue if it is being actively worked, or if you plan to start that work soon.
